resources.string: This is a random string used for the sole purpose of generating a unique integer for notification

This app does is currently not recieving the heart rate from your heart rate device. Make sure:\n -That your heart rate device is turned on and is transmitting the heart rate.\n -That you have not changed your heart rate device. If you have changed it please set your new device through the advanced settings section of this app

This app is now monitoring your heart rate. You may now move to another screen on your phone. This app will continue monitoring your heart rate even if you switch off your phone. If you wnat to stop this app come back to this screen and hit the Stop button

This app may not work as intended because:
 -You may have not entered any phone numbers that may be alerted in an emergency.
 -Or you may not have enabled SMS or dial for that number.
 -Unless you are testing the app make sure that you set up phone numbers in the Settings->Contacts section. The dial and sms checkboxes besides the phone numbers must be checked.
This software is past it\'s expiration date. Please contact the developer - and part with your wealth!
Scanning for your heart rate device. Please wait
VitalSigns App has stopped. You must manually restart if you want the app to run again
Please enable bluetooth on your phone.
Bluetooth not supported on your phone. This app need bluetooth to work.
